content.heading: HTML Link Colors
paragraphs: Links change color based on state: unvisited, visited, hovered, or active.

content.heading: Custom Link Colors
paragraphs: Use CSS pseudo-classes to style link states:

<style>
  a:link { color: green; text-decoration: none; }
  a:visited { color: darkorange; text-decoration: none; }
  a:hover { color: red; text-decoration: underline; }
  a:active { color: gold; text-decoration: underline; }
</style>

content.heading: Links as Buttons
paragraphs: Style links as buttons with CSS:

<style>
  a:link, a:visited {
    background-color: #4CAF50;
    color: white;
    padding: 10px 20px;
    text-align: center;
    text-decoration: none;
    display: inline-block;
    border-radius: 5px;
  }
  a:hover, a:active {
    background-color: #388E3C;
  }
</style>
